main event: Two separate sightings of an unidentified object resembling a large ball of fire were reported in Lakehurst, New Jersey in 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed by civilians and classified as a large ball of fire,The duration of the observation was approximately 10 seconds,The object made a sound similar to an aircraft,There were conflicting data regarding the nature of the sighting,The reports lacked physical evidence and photographs.
